title: Rerolled 3 champion shards into a permanent, now it's missing.
body: This weekend I rerolled 3 champion shards and received a Nasus champion permanent. When I signed on today I didn't see the champion permanent or the shards I used to reroll. Please help.

replies.body:
When you use 3 champion shards to reroll for a champion permanent, it automatically uses up the shards and then grants you the champion. I went ahead and pulled up your account to double check that Nasus was added correctly, and I do see him in your champion pool! 

Hit me back up if you still don't see Nasus in your champion collection!
